articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Spain's top criminal court opens a preliminary investigation into the country's football federation president Luis Rubiales after he kissed player Jenni Hermoso on the lips.
articles.title: Spanish prosecutors open investigation into Rubiales kiss

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: His trial for alleged election interference is set for 4 March, 2024 - a day ahead of Super Tuesday.
articles.title: Trump faces 4 March 2024 trial just a day before Super Tuesday

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Hundreds gathered on Sunday to remember the three victims of a racist shooting in the Florida city.
articles.title: Jacksonville shooting: DeSantis booed at vigil for victims of racist attack

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Florida mourns a young father, a caring mother and a teenage cashier who died in a racist shooting.
articles.title: Jacksonville shooting: Mourners honour victims of racist attack

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: West Point academy unveiled the contents of a nearly 200-year old lead box. The contents were unexpected.
articles.title: A muddy reveal for mysterious West Point time capsule from 1820s

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Susie Richter did not expect all her cats to survive the wildfires and was elated when they did.
articles.title: Maui woman visits burnt home each day to feed cats

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Florida's governor warns residents living in low-lying coastal areas to seek higher ground.
articles.title: Tropical storm Idalia places Florida on alert for major hurricane

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Ex-White House aide Mark Meadows wants the case moved to federal court. Other defendants could follow.
articles.title: Trump Georgia election case faces first major test

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A school in India is ordered sealed after its teacher asked students to slap their Muslim classmate.
articles.title: Uttar Pradesh: India school shut down over slapping row

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: After wildfires forced residents to leave, bears have been seen in the empty streets.
articles.title: Bears encroach on evacuated Canadian town
